```{r setup, include=FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)


library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(scales)
library(ggthemes)
library(usmap)
library(ggsn)
library(ggmap)
library(ggrepel)
library(maps)
library(grid)
library(mapdata)
library(maptools)
library(stringr)
library(dplyr)
library(choroplethr)

states <- map_data("state")
df <- subset(states, region =="wisconsin")

counties <- map_data("county")
county <- subset(counties, region =="wisconsin")
county 

base <- ggplot(data = df, mapping = aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group)) + 
  coord_fixed(1.3) + 
  geom_polygon(color = "black", fill = "white")
base + theme_nothing()


```



# DATA

```{r}

giant_rag <- read.csv("MAPS.csv")

```



## NAMES MAP

```{r}

base + 
  geom_point(data = giant_rag, 
             mapping = aes(x = long, y = lat, group = pop, label = pop, color = resistance_1x), 
             size = 2.5) +
  geom_polygon(data = county, 
               fill = "NA", 
               color = "gray") +
  geom_label_repel(data = giant_rag, 
                   aes(label = pop, group = 1, , color = resistance_1x),
                   max.overlaps = 100,
                   box.padding   = 0.5, 
                   point.padding = 0.2,
                   segment.color = 'grey50', 
                   size = 4,
                   seed = TRUE,
                   show.legend = FALSE) +  
  north(df, location = 'topright', symbol = 1, anchor = c(x = -92.5, y = 47)) +
  scale_color_manual(name = "Putative-Resistance", values = c("cyan4", "red", "orange2", "darkgreen")) +
  theme_map() +
  labs(fill="", y = "Latitude", x = "Longitude", title = "Giant Ragweed Putative-Resistance in WI - 1x POST") +
  theme(axis.text=element_blank(), 
        axis.title=element_blank(), 
        panel.background = element_rect(fill="white", color = "black"), 
        panel.grid.major = element_line(color = "white"), 
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
        panel.border = element_rect(fill = NA,color = "white", size = 0.5, linetype = "solid"),
        legend.title = element_text(size = 18, colour = "black", face = "bold", hjust = 0),
        legend.text = element_text(size = 18, colour = "black"), 
        legend.key = element_rect(fill = NA),
        legend.key.width = unit(0.5, "line"),
        legend.position = c(0.7, 0.8), 
        legend.background = element_rect(fill =NA), 
        plot.title = element_text(color = "darkgreen", face = "bold", size = 25, hjust = 0.5)) +
  ggsave("MAP_1X.jpeg", units = "in", width = 10, height = 10, dpi = 600)


```
